sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { showHeroes = true; showConfig = true; showDownloader = true; showUploader = true; showSearch = true; toggleHeroes() { this.showHeroes = !this.showHeroes; } toggleConfig() { this.showConfig = !this.showConfig; } toggleDownloader() { this.showDownloader = !this.showDownloader; } toggleUploader() { this.showUploader = !this.showUploader; } toggleSearch() { this.showSearch = !this.showSearch; } }

HttpClient Example
